comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Count Mihály Ádám György Miklós Károlyi de Nagykároly (4 March 1875 – 19 March 1955) was briefly Hungary's leader in 1918-19 during a short-lived democracy. He served as Prime Minister between 1 – 16 November 1918 and as President between 16 November 1918 – 21 March 1919.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: trialsanderrors: Thanks for the more detailed information about Karolyi. The photos of Karolyi in the wikipedia article you cited, do look like the man in this image.  We will add his fuller name to the image decription when we update.
